ip_address.description: IP address the endpoint can assume to send/receive flows. IP must be unique in the network.

attached_network_device.description: Peer network device (switch) details. If not provided, it's assumed to be discovered using other protocols (LLDP).

chassis_id.description: MAC address for the peer network device. If provided, mac-address must uniquely identify the network device.

port_id.description: The ifAlias of the peer network device the end point is connected to. If provided, interface must uniquely identify the switch port.

label.description: Freeform string label for the endpoint

bandwidth.description: Maximum bandwidth in kbps that the sender is allowed to send.

role.description: The role of the endpoint as a sender or receiver.

endpoint_profile.description: The transmission packet profile of the endpoint
